entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
